edu.iu.dsc.tws.api.compute.executor

Interface IParallelOperation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractParallelOperation, AllGatherBatchOperation, AllGatherStreamingOperation, AllReduceBatchOperation, AllReduceStreamingOperation, BroadcastBatchOperation, BroadcastStreamingOperation, DirectBatchOperation, DirectStreamingOperation, GatherBatchOperation, GatherStreamingOperation, JoinBatchOperation, KeyedGatherBatchOperation, KeyedGatherStreamingOperation, KeyedPartitionBatchOperation, KeyedPartitionStreamOperation, KeyedReduceBatchOperation, KeyedReduceStreamingOperation, PartitionBatchOperation, PartitionStreamingOperation, ReduceBatchOperation, ReduceStreamingOperation

    public interface IParallelOperation
    Represents a parallel communication operation
